name: places/ChIJuRgbxI5YwokRQNGno0PBqKA
formattedAddress: 50 W 77th St 1st Floor, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 50 W 77th St 1st Floor, New York, NY 10024-5176, USA

originalText.text: .Dr. Lieu was recommended by my internist after my gyno of 15 years retired. She's awesome! Efficient, knowledgeable, caring and professional. Everything you could ask for in a doctor.  I was seen very quickly.  She makes you feel very comfortable throughout the appointment, and she was prepared having reviewed my record before greeting me.  So grateful.

text.text: .Dr. Lieu was recommended by my internist after my gyno of 15 years retired. She's awesome! Efficient, knowledgeable, caring and professional. Everything you could ask for in a doctor.  I was seen very quickly.  She makes you feel very comfortable throughout the appointment, and she was prepared having reviewed my record before greeting me.  So grateful.

originalText.text: Dr. Lieu is very disrespectful of her patient's time, making them wait for unreasonably long periods of time before being seen, and occasionally telling patients, after arrival, that their confirmed appointments will not be honored. Her office staff are similarly rude and unprofessional. Dr. Lieu is not a terrible doctor; she is competent and friendly enough. "Not terrible," however, is not enough to justify treating patients like walking insurance payments. In this city full of excellent doctors with well-trained, service-oriented offices, I am confident that I will find a doctor who is capable of treating their patients with a little respect and empathy.

originalText.text: Do not recommend her at all. She does not care about her patients. You are just an appointment to her and she is disconnected. Dr. Lieu is very disrespectful of her patient's time, making them wait for unreasonably long periods of time before being seen, and occasionally telling patients, after arrival, that their confirmed appointments will not be honored.  I am questioning NYU's hiring practices.

originalText.text:
I will not be trusting my reproductive organs to a doctor who is inconsiderate of her patients time and health!  New patients steer clear of Dr. Hsiao Mei Lieu as she has no regard for your time. I arrived at the office for my confirmed visit on time. I was told I could checkin automatically. The receptionist informed me I was 30 mins late which I was not and I showed her my confirmation email. I was told to take a seat she would speak to the Dr. I waited 15 minutes and was told I could reschedule for an appointment 2 weeks out. The receptionist confirmed her latest appointment to be 4:30pm. I asked why I wasn't seen today seeing as her "4:30 pm patient was a no show" (I was clearly the 4:30 pm!). She phoned the Dr once again and I could hear her saying tell her no I'm not available she can reschedule should she have an emergency she can visit a clinic. The receptionist asked me to reschedule to which I responded, I didn't take the afternoon off from work to be treated so poorly by a doctor who doesn't care for her patients!
I'm highly disappointed.

originalText.text: Doctor Lieu is the best doctor I’ve had. She is so professional, kind and she replies messages. I feel so lucky to be treated by her.
